listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.1-3 are included:

listitem.simpara: A French translation is now available. (42326).
The Linux kernel has been updated to 4.1.34 (41058, 42727).
The program univention-check-templates now checks all files below /etc/univention/ for modifications (41735).
The &ucsUCRV; ldap/limits has been added to configure OpenLDAP server limits (34873).
The slapd backup cron job can now be disabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; slapd/backup to false. The cron interval can be configured with the &ucsUCRV; slapd/backup/cron (38679).
The ldap client parameters NETWORK_TIMEOUT, TIMEOUT and TIMELIMIT can now be configured with the &ucsUCR; variables ldap/client/network_timeout, ldap/client/timeout and ldap/client/timelimit (39307).
The index lines in the slapd.conf are now wrapped if the line is longer than 2048 characters (41648).
The &ucsUCRV; ldap/index/quickmode has been added. If set to true, the LDAP re-index tool (ldap_setup_index) is started in quick mode (fewer integrity checks, improved indexing time) (41281).
The directory logger now handles logging of entries with missing LDAP operational attributes (25404).
The robustness of logging deleted entries has been fixed in the directory logger (34916).
The logging of binary values using base64 has been improved in the directory logger (34420).
The &ucsUCRV; ldap/logging/dellogdir now has a description and the value of the &ucsUCRV; ldap/logging is interpreted as a boolean (42665).

LDAP entries were not removed correctly, if they were moved to a location filtered by LDAP access control. In that case the Univention Directory Listener modules registered for those entries were not called or called twice (42029).

When objects were moved to a subtree protected by LDAP access control lists, the listener modules using modrdn='1' were only called once with the original command='r' to signal the first phase of the move operation. They were not called again for the second phase with command='a' as the Listener cache entry was already deleted during the first phase and the modules were no longer associated with that entry. The Listener now calls the modules with command='d' to signal a deletion (32685).
The Listener now checks the file system for enough free space and aborts, if too few is available. The default of 10 MiB can be changed through the new &ucsUCRV; listener/freespace (42573).
The Listener now writes the state of each handler just after initialization (41842).
For each changed LDAP entry the distinguished name is now logged with debug level PROCESS (41960).
Several quoting problems in the init and runit scripts have been fixed (42328).
Build-hardening and more warnings have been enabled for the compiler. Error handling and logging have been improved (42701).
On 32 bit architectures calculating the remaining free space could result into an overflow error, which terminates the Listener. This has been fixed (42725).
Wildcard and automatic substring searches are now configurable via &ucsUCR; (42388).
A French translation is now available. (41776, 41773, 42260).
The PAM unix configuration for password changes has been adjusted. New passwords are stored with SHA-512 instead of MD5. Changing empty passwords is not allowed anymore (42103).
The App Center can now create a database for an App if it wishes so. It is useful for Docker Apps as the database is created outside the container (40857).
The web interface links for Docker Apps without automatic Apache integration have been fixed (41626).
If needed, Docker Apps may now get read-only access to the Host's certificate (42016).
Some typos have been corrected in the App Center (42157).
The configuration for Docker Apps have been improved (42401).
Where appropriate, the App Center packages now depend on other App Center packages with explicit versions. This prevents errors in case one package failed to install (42362).
Apps may now specify packages that shall be installed depending on the server role of the system (42200).
The docker env file is now a &ucsUCR; template (42317).
When upgrading from a Non-Docker App to a Docker App, Join scripts of the Docker version are run last (42498).
Fixed automatically deleting files that Non-Docker Apps do not have in their App repository, but instead are installed as part of their packages (42485).
Database packages are marked as user installed when a Docker App has database integration (42488).
Fixed handling of App Settings for Docker Apps that do not use a UCS based container (42527).

If a Docker version of an App is released, but a Non-Docker version is installed, this version is not shown (and not installable) by default. If the App Center is used from a different system, an update is shown, though. This display issue has been fixed (42713).
The initialization of all Apps could result in a traceback for Apps with a certain version history. This issue has been fixed (41992).
A race condition could lead to data loss in the Univention Config Registry. This issue has been fixed (42619).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Attribute names with ;binary suffix are now considered when sanitizing object classes (41824).
A regression has been fixed which caused that the value 0 was written to the LDAP entry for extended attributes with boolean syntax (41829).
The ldap modlist hooks are now executed before sanitizing object classes (41899).
When deleting a computer object, the computer is now removed from the list of name servers in its DNS zone objects (37086).
Some typos have been corrected (42156).
Error messages regarding attribute locking have been improved (42386).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: Adapted the way univention-system-setup-boot gets uninstalled at the end of system setup (42808).
univention-ad-connector is now only installed on the first system joining an Active Directory (42538).
Fixed an issue that the joinscript 92univention-management-console-web-server was not properly configured when installing from the ISO (42500).
Clarified sentences at the last system setup page (40601).
Fixed basesystem setup errors (42553).
Fix a crash during validation in special DNS configurations (42179).
Use correct INI value for NotifyVendor information in univention-app-appliance (42068).
The console login message is now deactivated during the fast demo mode. This corrects problems when uploading the license file during an app appliance configuration (42031).
App appliances without a customized branding will show now the default UCS boot splash instead of a black screen (42165).
The interoperability of older UCS installation images or appliances with an update to the latest UCS version during the installation and setup process has been improved (42095).
Software packages are no longer automatically cached when installing univention-system-setup-boot (42122).
Some typos have been corrected (42075).
A missing package dependency has been added (41920).
During DVD installation the packages are now installed directly from the DVD, instead of being copied to the disk beforehand (42402).
Initialize updater/identify from ISO image metadata (42483).
Added French translations to the package di-univention-system-setup (42325).
The DHCP options mapping has been fixed so that multiple values can be provided (33614).
The failover peer property description has been renamed into failover peer configuration (39876).
Some univentionObject object classes are added to automatically created objects (38073).
The DHCP netmask property has been renamed into address prefix length (27123).
DHCP Pools may now be created underneath of shared subnets (40649).
DHCP Pools may now be created via the DHCP UMC module (42177).
Positions and types of superordinate objects are now validated before creating objects (34764).
The UMC modules don't crash anymore if the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/web/sizelimit is empty (39588).
When adding objects the Container widget is not shown anymore if a superordinate is selected as these objects are created underneath of the superordinate (26133).
The Updater has been adapted for UCS 4.1-4 (42655).
The tool univention-upgrade no longer fails if searching for new apps fails, e.g. because of network errors (41869).
Some typos in links addresses have been corrected (42076).
A check for a valid APT sources list has been added before updating the Packages files or performing package maintenance (42450).
The parsing of LDAP bind credentials for UDM in umc.sh has been fixed (24758).
Variables in umc.sh are now declared local to not clobber global variables (24758).
The module description of the SAML identity provider module is now translated correctly (41187).
A new &ucsUCRV; mail/postfix/myorigin has been introduced, that allows to set Postfix' myorigin variable (see ). The default value is the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) (32572).
In some situations Dovecot was not properly configured after the initial installation. This has been fixed (42032).
The PyKota database is allowed to access localhost via IPv6 too (41915).

Consecutive restarts of the Apache daemon could result in a race condition, as the PID file may be not available. A short wait for the the Apache daemon PID file creation is introduced by this update (41781).
The PAM unix configuration for password changes has been adjusted. New passwords are stored with SHA-512 instead of MD5. Changing empty passwords is not allowed anymore (42103).

The new &ucsUCRV; libvirt/group can be used to set the group membership of the UNIX domain socket of the libvirt daemon, which allows users of that group to access the management capabilities of the libvirt daemon without becoming root (42622).
Quoting issues to support App installations with versions containing spaces have been fixed (42602).
When upgrading the underlying container, all available release updates are installed in one run (42603).
Abort installation if the App is not found instead of doing nothing (39803).
The MySQL port is no longer blocked for Docker containers (42117).
Apply docker firewall settings during start of docker (42698).
Samba has been updated to version 4.5.1 (42624).
samba-tool ntacl sysvolcheck has been fixed (39633).

The smb.conf parameters security mask, directory security mask, force security mode, force directory security mode are not written to Samba share definitions any longer, because Samba removed support for them (42679).
Samba 4.5.1 has disabled ntlm auth by default. In UCS, this setting can be configured via the &ucsUCRV; samba/ntlm/auth and it is activated by default (42847).
Locking in the SYSVOL sync script has been improved (42475).

In case Samba 4 is installed only on a DC backup the re-join fails. The join script now checks if this system is configured as S4 connector system and re-initialized the system. In this case all other Samba 4 DCs need to be re-joined (39251).
The idmap database is now removed while re-joining the system. This reduces the re-join time (40511).

The following &ucsUCR; variables have been added to configure the Winbind settings: samba/winbind/nested/groups, samba/winbind/rpc/only, samba/winbind/max/clients, samba/winbind/enum/users and samba/winbind/enum/groups (41767).
It is possible that Samba 4 joins against another DC and not against the master. This could led to different problems. The join script now tries to join against the S4 Connector system first (30836).
The group DC Backup Hosts is now member of the group Enterprise Domain Controllers. This is needed for the SYSVOL replication in case Samba 4 is not installed on the DC master (41549).
The package univention-nagios-samba has been added to the list of recommended packages for univention-samba4 (29463).
The Nagios check UNIVENTION_SAMBA_REPLICATION has been added to check the state of Samba DRS replication (29463).

The slave PDC join script now updates some descriptions for the default users and groups. This avoids rejects if the Univention S4 Connector is not installed on the DC master in a distributed UCS@school environment (36831).
The slave PDC host account is now demoted from the central Samba in a distributed UCS@school environment (41168).
The school OU was not defined while joining a new Windows client. This issue has been fixed (41765).
The S4-Connector has been adjusted to use the tombstone reanimation feature of Samba 4.5.1 (42120).
The S4-Connector didn't synchronize TXT records. This issue has been fixed (41006).
The performance of the S4 connector when handling many objects has been improved (41999).
The Active Directory connector didn't support synchronization of groups with more than 1500 members. This issue has been fixed (41248, (41744).
The package dependency to the master and backup server role packages has been removed (41682, (42489).
The sync mode can now be configured through Univention Configuration Registry variables for users, groups and containers separately (41685).
The ignored subtrees can now be configured through the &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/mapping/ignoresubtree/* (41680).
Moving an object to a non-readable LDAP position resulted to a wrong move. This issue has been fixed (41938).
The command line parameter -skipAdMemberMode has been added to univention-join to skip the ad member mode configuration (40611).
The command line parameter -containerAdMemberMode has been added to univention-join for special handling of ad member mode in containers (40611).
univention-docker-container-mode now by default calls univention-join with the parameter -containerAdMemberMode (40611).
univention-docker-container-mode now by default skips App updates when upgrading packages (42760).
univention-docker-container-mode now by default skips the version check when joining the domain. This allows the installation of Docker Apps that have a higher UCS version than the host (42735).
The package univention-mysql has been added to the list of maintained packages (42026).

The bind address of MySQL has been changed to 0.0.0.0 to accept connections from anywhere. However, univention-firewall will reject most connections. The Docker interface will be forwarded, giving container Apps from the App Center access to MySQL (42307).
NFS home shares with names containing blanks are now also unmounted properly (32018).
Several bugs have been fixed in univention-home-mounter which could lead to the root file system being filled with temporary files (42491).
SSH connection multiplexing is now disabled in univention-ssh, as processes can get stuck waiting for the master connection to terminate (42476).
Handling of symbolic links has been improved in univention-skel (42493).
The function check_ldap_tls_connection now uses univention-ldapsearch to better handle LDAP server restarts while joining (42420).
